article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center of West Virginia
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of West Virginia.

With over 30 years of experience in assisting U.S. exporters around the globe, the U.S. Commercial Service is your first stop on the road to international success!

With an international network comprised of trade specialists and commercial officers in over 109 U.S. cities and in U.S. Embassies and Consulates in 77 countries, the U.S. Commercial Service is in a unique position to serve the needs of U.S. exporters and help them succeed internationally.

As part of the United States Department of Commerce, The U.S. Commercial Service,U.S. Export Assistance Center of West Virginia,located in Charleston and Wheeling, assists U.S. companies in exporting by:

  • Providing expert counseling, advice, and advocacy
  • Producing research on overseas markets and industries
  • Promoting your product and service in overseas markets
  • Finding international partners (agents, distributors, JV, licensing, etc.)

The U.S. Commercial Service combines these services and its global network with the trade finance expertise and programs of the U.S. Small Business Administration and the Export-Import Bank of the United States to help make you a successful exporter.

Consider the U.S. Commercial Service your first stop in export assistance information and service!

Start exploring your international options today by speaking with one of our trade specialists!
